snippet.title: Cards of Heart Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Cards of Heart, a cozy role-playing card game, is now available on Steam! 

Amalia is a librarian's assistant living in the small fantasy town of Respite. But when she finds herself surrounded by Shadows- negative thoughts given physical form- she must team up with a light spirit named Ljos to face the Shadows and move forward from the pain of her past.

Combining gameplay mechanics based on real-world therapeutic techniques with a rich narrative, the game depicts the heartache and hope that are part of confronting our inner Shadows.
